text:
[Verse]
Under the silver light
Stars are out tonight
Whispers in the breeze
Feel the night with ease

[Verse 2]
Shadows softly sway
Lost in a dreamy play
Glances meet and spark
Hearts start to embark

[Chorus]
Moonlit dance we fly
Touching the sky
Hold me close and tight
All through the night

[Verse 3]
Steps in perfect time
Rhythms are divine
Echoes in the dark
Secrets we embark

[Chorus]
Moonlit dance we fly
Touching the sky
Hold me close and tight
All through the night

[Bridge]
Dreams come alive
In this moonlit dive
Hand in hand we glide
Together side by side
title: Moonlit Dance
